forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 77F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Rain becoming heavy at times in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
